pr_title: HIVE-23358: MSCK Repair should remove insignificant 0's from numeric partition values

timeline.message: HIVE-23358: MSCK Repair should remove insignificant 0's from partition values
Add new test file in testconfiguration.properties

timeline.bodyText: Avoid outer negation and use if ((partitionCols != null) && !partitionCols.isEmpty()). Even isEmpty need not be checked here as below loop won't execute if it is empty.
timeline.author: sankarh

timeline.bodyText: As a follow-up, do we need to validate date, timestamp values before add partitions? Are we checking it during inserts or add partition command?
timeline.author: sankarh
